item.title: Dead Gorgeous Episode 13 (final) : Old Ghosts
item.description: Sophie is possessed by a ghost with a score to settle and it's a race against time for her sisters to save her from expulsion. CAST: Melissa Howard, Poppy Lee Friar

item.title: Dead Gorgeous Episode 12 Love's First Kiss
item.description: Rebecca's affections are tested when an old family portrait is unveiled as one of Ainsbury's hidden treasures.

item.title: Dead Gorgeous Episode 11 Smoke And Mirrors
item.description: Rebecca lands herself in hot water when Mr Griffith tells her that a continuous string of failing grades has put her place at Ainsbury in jeopardy.

item.title: Dead Gorgeous Episode 10 Grendel's Gold
item.description: What should have been a quiet half term break for the three sisters turns into 24 hours of chaos with one fast spreading illness and three out of control ghostly houseguests.

item.title: Dead Gorgeous Episode 9 A Friend In Deed
item.description: Sophie battles against the seduction of being popular when she discovers a new found talent for sports.

item.title: Degrassi: The Next Generation Series 6 Episode 17 Sunglasses At Night
item.description: Marco's at loose ends with Dylan gone, and nothing seems exciting. He and Spinner decide to take a road trip - but cash is the key. When Marco's online poker skills start to show, he decides it's time to up the stakes.

item.title: Degrassi: The Next Generation Series 6 Episode 16 Love My Way
item.description: When Snake discovers Emma buying birth control, he surprises everyone with his anger. He's not comfortable with Emma and Sean doing that! But as far as Emma's concerned - he's going to have to get comfortable with it.

item.title: Degrassi: The Next Generation Series 6 Episode 15 Free Fallin: Part 2
item.description: With her degree in jeopardy thanks to her failing grades, Paige slinks home to Toronto but nobody can know the truth about what happened. Despite rising panic attacks Paige is committed to keeping her secret.

item.title: Degrassi: The Next Generation Series 6 Episode 14 Free Fallin: Part 1
item.description: After a spectacular panic attack during a midterm exam, Paige's professor at Banting offers her one more chance - which comes in the form of a ton of work to be completed over the holiday weekend.

item.title: Degrassi: The Next Generation Series 6 Episode 13 If You Leave
item.description: Dylan has been absent, grumpy, and completely mute, making Marco worry that Dylan is cheating again. Jimmy and Spinner are happy to help catch him in the act, but none of them is expecting what they find...

item.title: Degrassi: The Next Generation Series 6 Episode 12 The Bitterest Pill
item.description: In shock over JT's death, Toby turns to Liberty, convinced that this sombre funeral isn't what JT would've wanted. Liberty agrees, and the two grief-stricken friends plan to throw a celebratory memorial for JT at Degrassi.

item.title: Degrassi: The Next Generation Series 6 Episode 11 Rock This Town
item.description: Manny's intent on getting over Craig, and uses Liberty's upcoming birthday as an excuse to throw a party at Emma's house while Spike and Snake are out of town. She's even got a great guy to introduce Liberty to.

item.title: Degrassi: The Next Generation Series 6 Episode 10 What's It Feel Like To Be A Ghost? Part 2
item.description: Derek and Danny are threatened by the Lakehurst goons, and learn they're really out for JT. JT goes to the opposing school and confronts the bullies when he learns that Mia's stuck in the middle of the conflict.

item.title: Degrassi: The Next Generation Series 6 Episode 9 What's It Feel Like To Be A Ghost? Part 1
item.description: Craig's back in town for a music festival - and Manny can't help picking up right where they left off. Craig's embracing the rock star lifestyle and Manny has to decide if this new, dangerous Craig is the same one she loves.

item.title: Pixelface Episode 21 Reset
item.description: Claireparker is fed up with the chaos in the console. But when she discovers the rest button hidden behind a panel in her bedroom, she finds a way to take control of life in the console.

item.title: Pixelface Episode 20 Quit Bugging Me
item.description: A comedy set within the fictional world of a computer game console, where the stars face their own triumphs, tragedies and funny mishaps.

item.title: Pixelface Episode 19 Out Of Sight
item.description: A comedy set within the fictional world of a computer game console, where the stars face their own triumphs, tragedies and funny mishaps.

item.title: Pixelface Episode 18 Mrs Dynamo's Son
item.description: A comedy set within the fictional world of a computer game console, where the stars face their own triumphs, tragedies and funny mishaps.

item.title: Pixelface Episode 17 Major Players
item.description: A comedy set within the fictional world of a computer game console, where the stars face their own triumphs, tragedies and funny mishaps.

item.title: Pixelface Episode 16 High Spirits
item.description: A comedy set within the fictional world of a computer game console, where the stars face their own triumphs, tragedies and funny mishaps.

item.title: Pixelface Episode 15 Fast And Furious
item.description: A comedy set within the fictional world of a computer game console, where the stars face their own triumphs, tragedies and funny mishaps.

item.title: Pixelface Episode 14 Body Swap
item.description: A comedy set within the fictional world of a computer game console, where the stars face their own triumphs, tragedies and funny mishaps.

item.title: Pixelface Episode 13 You're History
item.description: A comedy set within the fictional world of a computer game console, where the stars face their own triumphs, tragedies and funny mishaps.

item.title: Big Babies Episode 12 Sleepover
item.description: Rocco is staying at Brooks' house for a sleepover. While the babies share a madcap dream-filled adventure, Budge has a midnight appointment with the biscuit tin.

item.title: Big Babies Episode 11 Beside The Seaside
item.description: Budge tags along with the bouncing babies to the seaside. A game of Eye Spy keeps the boys amused, but their holiday is cut short when a hungry Budge causes the car to break down.

item.title: Big Babies Episode 10 The Race
item.description: The babies dress up as racing drivers when Gonch challenges them to a race round the park in their buggies. Budge hitches a ride in the babies' buggy, as he can't wait to get his hands on the ice-cream trophy.

item.title: Big Babies Episode 9 Dino Dino Dino Town
item.description: The baby boys are taken to a dinosaur theme park where every visitor gets a chocolate dinosaur egg. Budge, Brooks' toy with a mind of his own, is keen to get his paws on the chocolate and tries to hijack the Time Train.

item.title: Big Babies Episode 8 Arts & Crafts
item.description: After his picture is shown on TV, Brooks pronounces himself an artist. Carole takes Rocco and Brooks to see Biscuit Henge, a gigantic sculpture made of biscuits. But where there are biscuits, there must be Budge...

item.title: Big Babies Episode 7 Rainy Day
item.description: The Frankenstein movie Rocco and Brooks are watching gives Budge the idea to make a 'Frankenbudge' which will help him collect biscuits. But once brought to life, 'Frankenbudge' has other plans...

item.title: Big Babies Episode 6 Birthday
item.description: It's Brooks' birthday and he announces to Rocco that it's going to be the best birthday ever. What's more, Brooks has invited a girl to his party. Rocco is impressed. But nothing goes quite the way Brooks imagined it would...

item.title: Big Babies Episode 5 Pet Shop
item.description: An outing to the pet shop leads to conflict between the boys - Brooks wants a dog, Rocco wants a hamster. All they can agree on is that their pet should talk.

item.title: Big Babies Episode 4 Market
item.description: Rocco and Brooks get taken to the market and meet the Gonch whose dad runs a stall. He explains to the boys about haggling and they compete for the best bargain.

item.title: Mortified Episode 9 Return Of The Mothership
item.description: Taylor and Hector spend time with an eccentric elderly couple who believe they will be reclaimed by an alien mothership any day. Will Taylor and Hector become believers themselves?

item.title: Mortified Episode 8 The Big Game
item.description: Witnessing Leon's soccer skill, Taylor is inspired to join the team.

item.title: Mortified Episode 7 Flag Fall
item.description: Taylor becomes image-conscious, and starts to worry about her appearance and dress code. This unfortunately coincides with Hector volunteering for flag duty at school, which registers quite high on the 'dork' scale.

item.title: Mortified Episode 6 The Talk
item.description: Taylor gets a crush on a teenaged martial arts instructor, and signs up for some classes. But her shift from childhood to adolescence is noticed by her parents, who decide it's high time they give her the dreaded 'Talk'.

item.title: Mortified Episode 5 The Chosen One
item.description: Taylor is inspired by the teachings of a Buddhist monk, who shares the concept of a simple life without possessions.

item.title: Mortified Episode 4 Mother In The Nude
item.description: Taylor is dumbstruck when she arrives home from school to find her mother creating a nude sculpture of herself, for a very public art competition. Worse still, her entire school class is attending the competition!

item.title: Mortified Episode 3 Learning To Surf
item.description: In a plan to prove herself to Leon, Taylor enters a surfing competition. The only problem is she can't surf, so she hires her father to give her some tips.

item.title: Mortified Episode 2 Bigger Than Vegas
item.description: Taylor gets nominated for school captain. But things don't quite go to plan, especially when it is revealed that the perfect Brittany Flune is also in the running.

item.title: Mortified Episode 1 Taylor's DNA
item.description: Taylor Fry is a lively smart-lipped kid with plenty of attitude, but the truth is she feels as if she doesn't belong. She's an outsider within her own family, with a father known as 'the underpant king', who could blame her?

item.title: Funny Face Episode 18 Up All Night
item.description: Eight desperate fruit are bounced from a produce truck on their way to market. If they are able to survive they must learn elaborate dances, spew ridiculous puns and grasp the true meaning of physical humour.

item.title: Funny Face Episode 17 Talent Show
item.description: Eight desperate fruit are bounced from a produce truck on their way to market. If they are able to survive they must learn elaborate dances, spew ridiculous puns and grasp the true meaning of physical humour.

item.title: Funny Face Episode 16 Organic
item.description: Eight desperate fruit are bounced from a produce truck on their way to market. If they are able to survive they must learn elaborate dances, spew ridiculous puns and grasp the true meaning of physical humour.

item.title: Funny Face Episode 15 The Fly 1
item.description: Eight desperate fruit are bounced from a produce truck on their way to market. If they are able to survive they must learn elaborate dances, spew ridiculous puns and grasp the true meaning of physical humour.

item.title: Funny Face Episode 14 Recreation
item.description: Eight desperate fruit are bounced from a produce truck on their way to market. If they are able to survive they must learn elaborate dances, spew ridiculous puns and grasp the true meaning of physical humour.

item.title: Funny Face Episode 13 Superhero
item.description: Eight desperate fruit are bounced from a produce truck on their way to market. If they are able to survive they must learn elaborate dances, spew ridiculous puns and grasp the true meaning of physical humour.

item.title: Funny Face Episode 12 Pets
item.description: Eight desperate fruit are bounced from a produce truck on their way to market. If they are able to survive they must learn elaborate dances, spew ridiculous puns and grasp the true meaning of physical humour.

item.title: Funny Face Episode 11 Big Musical Number
item.description: Eight desperate fruit are bounced from a produce truck on their way to market. If they are able to survive they must learn elaborate dances, spew ridiculous puns and grasp the true meaning of physical humour.

item.title: Funny Face Episode 10 Shortage
item.description: Eight desperate fruit are bounced from a produce truck on their way to market. If they are able to survive they must learn elaborate dances, spew ridiculous puns and grasp the true meaning of physical humour.

item.title: Funny Face Episode 9 The Fruit Olympics
item.description: Eight desperate fruit are bounced from a produce truck on their way to market. If they are able to survive they must learn elaborate dances, spew ridiculous puns and grasp the true meaning of physical humour.

item.title: Street Monsters Episode 18 The Big-For-His-Age Monster In 'Playground'
item.description: It is a lovely day at the playpark and all the little monsters are having lots of gentle fun. So what will happen when the huge and lumbering Big-For-His-Age Monster gatecrashes the party?

item.title: Street Monsters Episode 16 Dave The Dinosaur In 'Escape'
item.description: Dave The Dinosaur is running for his life again! Only this time he's using as many forms of transport as he can find to get as far away as possible. But for how long will he be able to escape extinction?

item.title: Street Monsters Episode 15 The Vain Monster In 'Shopping'
item.description: The Vain Monster loves shopping. When she sees the Gentlemen Monster at the shopping centre she decides to make herself even more 'gorgeous' with some retail therapy. Will he succumb to her charms?

item.title: Street Monsters Episode 14 The Whoopee Cushion Monster In 'Date'
item.description: All Grown-up wants to do is go on a nice, civilised grown-up date with his nice, new grown-up girlfriend. Unfortunately it seems that the mischievous Whoopee Cushion Monster has other ideas.

item.title: Street Monsters Episode 13 The Naughty Monster In 'Ice Cream'
item.description: The Naughty Monster has an Ice-Cream seller's bicycle and it is a beautifully hot day. All the little monsters are desperate to buy an ice cream but the Naughty Monster just wants to laugh at them as they try to stop him.

item.title: Street Monsters Episode 12 The Big-For-Age Monster In 'Feeding'
item.description: The little monsters go down to the park to feed the Venus-Fly-Trap-Piranha-Duck Monsters. They are having a lovely time throwing titbits into the water for the Duck monsters until Big-For-His-Age monster gets over excited!

item.title: Street Monsters Episode 11 The Cop And Stealer In 'Chase'
item.description: The Stealer loves stealing stuff but he adores being chased so the cheeky chap only pinches things when he knows The Cop is watching! But after a nice long chase, has The Stealer really found the best hiding place?

item.title: Street Monsters Episode 10 The Bodyswap Monsters In 'Snatched'
item.description: The Body Swap Monsters love nothing more than winning over an audience with their audacious dance moves. What starts off as a simple dance routine, using their unique body swapping skills turns into a body popping showdown.

item.title: Street Monsters Episode 9 The Show Off Monster In 'Skate'
item.description: It's show time for the show off monster! A skateboard and a few tricky obstacles are all he needs to put on a performance and impress any monsters he hopes are watching him. But a need for speed ends up a risky business!

item.title: Kaeloo Episode 5 Let's Play Magicians
item.description: The buddies are putting on a magic show.

item.title: Kaeloo Episode 25 Let's Play Golf!
item.description: Four loopy pals in Smileyland often get bored so they invent crazy and fun games to pass the time. It's hilarious, wacky and has an explosive climax that make up the dynamite cocktail of Kaeloo!

item.title: Kaeloo Episode 24 Let's Play The Quest For the Wholly Gruel
item.description: Our buddies are playing explorers, to the great delight of Stumpy, a fan of adventure movies. Once again, poor old Stumpy is disillusioned: as Guardian of the Gruel, he's shut in a pitch-black cave.

item.title: Kaeloo Episode 23 Let's Play Air Pockets
item.description: To please Stumpy, a flight-simulator fan, Kaeloo suggests playing airplanes. Mr Cat immediately claims the role of pilot. Kaeloo will be the air hostess. For once, Stumpy doesn't have to be the girl!

item.title: Kaeloo Episode 22 Let's Play Spies
item.description: Our buddies have taken on different roles. Quack-Quack is the terrorist, a specialist in explosive yogurts who wants to take over and rule Smileyland. Kaeloo, Stumpy and Mr Cat are secret agents.

item.title: Ship To Shore Episode 11 Wild One
item.description: The apparent reconciliation between the island base kids takes on a whole new dimension when the rival artistic visions of Julie and Babe result in an intense competition to see who can make the best rock video.

item.title: Ship To Shore Episode 10 Rites Of Salvage
item.description: Ralph's dreams of reviving the Sea Scout troop (and for being accepted by the local kids) are boosted when the kids find a mysterious deserted yacht.

item.title: Ship To Shore Episode 9 Money For Jam Jars
item.description: The good intentions of Circe Island adults to win the 'Tidy Town' award are thwarted when the kids discover there is money to be made from recycling.

item.title: Ship To Shore Episode 8 Backwards Messages
item.description: Kelvin 'bugs' Hermes' phone. Hermes discovers the miniature transmitter under his desk and is led to believe that the kids are being brainwashed by a spy ring!

item.title: Ship To Shore Episode 7 Missing In Action
item.description: Julie comes down with the measles and can't go to school camp on the mainland. Kelvin fakes illness to avoid going on the camp, planning to spend the week in the pinball parlours and fast food joints on the mainland.

item.title: Ship To Shore Episode 6 Good Vibrations
item.description: Ralph and Julie's friendship continues to grow when Ralph agrees to help Julie stop whales beaching themselves on Circe Island.

item.title: Ship To Shore Episode 5 Presumed Guilty
item.description: Kevin is accused of stealing money from Ralph and rigging the competition to win a ghetto blaster. His trial finds him and the other kids guilty of various deceits, but the theft itself is a tale of another kind...

item.title: Ship To Shore Episode 4 Grate Escape
item.description: The kids use wartime secret tunnels as a means of getting to a concert on the mainland. Julie and Ralph join forces to make a political statement at the concert.

item.title: Ship To Shore Episode 3 Wild Child
item.description: Babe Keogh gets sent to the school on the mainland after a series of misdemeanours. The island kids discover that their own school will be closed due to falling numbers. How will they get Babe to come back?

item.title: Oggy And The Cockroaches (8' Version) Episode 136 Joey And The Magic Bean
item.description: Joey realizes that he's too small and that really bugs him. He wants to grow up and look like the Jolly Green Giant whose photo he keeps under his pillow. One morning he finds magic beans on his pillow and eats them...

item.title: Oggy And The Cockroaches (8' Version) Episode 135
item.description: Oggy and Jack are on a safari photo-shoot in Africa. With his super camera, Oggy snaps shots of all the animals like a maniac. This is not necessarily to the liking of the local animals!

item.title: Oggy And The Cockroaches (8' Version) Episode 134 Flower Power
item.description: Oggy stumbles on a book that depicts the world of hippies and flower-power. With his bible in hand, Oggy starts wandering through the house reciting mantras about peace and love every time the roaches make his life miserable!

item.title: Oggy And The Cockroaches (8' Version) Episode 133 Sitcom
item.description: Joey discovers a can of... canned laughter! Joey lets laughs out of the box every time Oggy makes the slightest gesture. Oggy starts chasing the roaches and at the end of the pursuit Oggy swallows the can!

item.title: Oggy And The Cockroaches (8' Version) Episode 132 Home Breaker
item.description: After an explosive practical joke, Bob the dog finds himself homeless. With nowhere else to go he decides to set up camp at Oggy's. Oggy is outraged and tries everything in the books to get rid of his imposing house guest!

item.title: Oggy And The Cockroaches (8' Version) Episode 131 Magic Carpet Ride
item.description: Oggy buys a Persian rug which turns out to be a flying carpet! With his habitual curiosity, Oggy climbs on for a spin. Of course he doesn't notice the fire-crackers that the little monsters have attached to the end!

item.title: Oggy And The Cockroaches (8' Version) Episode 130 Pharonuf
item.description: Oggy and Jack are visiting an Egyptian pyramid. While he's chasing the nasty roaches he falls into a deep hole in the middle of the pyramid. Lost in the never-ending labyrinth inside he finally pops out...but it's 2500 BC!

item.title: Oggy And The Cockroaches (8' Version) Episode 129 Pharonuf
item.description: Oggy and Jack are visiting an Egyptian pyramid. While he's chasing the nasty roaches he falls into a deep hole in the middle of the pyramid. Lost in the never-ending labyrinth inside he finally pops out...but it's 2500 BC!

item.title: Oggy And The Cockroaches (8' Version) Episode 128 Going Up
item.description: Oggy builds an elevator in order to catch the nasty little bugs more easily. But the roaches immediately build one of their own...

item.title: Oggy And The Cockroaches (8' Version) Episode 127 The Pumkin That Pretended To Be A Ferrari
item.description: On his way home from shopping, Oggy unintentionally steps on a frog. He picks it up and kisses it to ask forgiveness. And bingo! the little frog immediately turns into a fairy!

item.title: Oggy And The Cockroaches (8' Version) Episode 126 Oggy's Puzzled
item.description: Oggy is getting ready to put the last piece of his huge, complicated jigsaw puzzle into place when suddenly the roaches steal it from him. With Jack and Oggy on their tail, the roaches wreak havoc as the chase begins!

item.title: Oggy And The Cockroaches (8' Version) Episode 125 Penalty Shot
item.description: Jack is glued to a soccer game on TV. Joey takes an interest in the game and with his two partners and a few buddies he forms two teams and organizes a match. But they need a soccer field...

item.title: Oggy And The Cockroaches (8' Version) Episode 124 Golf Curse
item.description: Jack takes Oggy out to play golf. Despite his complete lack of talent and style, Oggy manages to sink holes-in-one right and left. The roaches decide to move the holes around in order to spice up the game.

item.title: MAL.COM Episode 7 Holly Makes Five
item.description: Holly moves in when she loses her job and the kids lose both their freedom and their minds.

item.title: MAL.COM Episode 6 Kinder Surprise
item.description: The Kid has the perfect plan to get out of going to school until Jake and Daisy try to fix things with the teacher.

item.title: MAL.COM Episode 5 Give A Goat
item.description: Daisy would do anything to win this year's Charity Queen Award as long as it doesn't involve her having to be truly charitable.

item.title: MAL.COM Episode 4 Rat In The Ranks
item.description: Daisy is determined to prove she saved the life of the science lab rat, even if it means she has to kill it...

item.title: MAL.COM Episode 3 Free Stuff
item.description: When Jake learns that Malcom can get things for free just by mentioning them on TV he thinks he has hit the mother load.

item.title: MAL.COM Episode 2 Secrets
item.description: Holly discovers that Daisy has been mocking up raunchy celebrity scandal pictures of Malcom in order to get more attention from the press. CAST: Geoff Paine, Luke Ledger, Ruby Hall, Gwy McKenna, Danielle Carter

item.title: MAL.COM Episode 1 Party On
item.description: Three homeless kids find themselves living the dream when they discover that Malcom Mann, the country's biggest TV star, is secretly a robot and they pretend to be his children. CAST: Geoff Paine, Luke Ledger, Ruby Hall

item.title: Desdemona Episode 3
item.description: Desdemona is not like other girls, she has an evil streak and only has to think an evil thought for her true devilishness to be unleashed upon the people around her.

item.title: Desdemona Episode 2
item.description: Desdemona is not like other girls, she has an evil streak and only has to think an evil thought for her true devilishness to be unleashed upon the people around her.

item.title: Desdemona Episode 1
item.description: Desdemona is not like other girls, she has an evil streak and only has to think an evil thought for her true devilishness to be unleashed upon the people around her.

item.title: Monsterchef Episode 3
item.description: A bunch of monsters vie for the title by cooking up ghastly and ghoulish dishes in a high pressure cook off!

item.title: Monsterchef Episode 2
item.description: A bunch of monsters vie for the title by cooking up ghastly and ghoulish dishes in a high pressure cook off!

item.title: Monsterchef Episode 1
item.description: A bunch of monsters vie for the title by cooking up ghastly and ghoulish dishes in a high pressure cook off!

item.title: Splatalot Episode 1
item.description: The attackers bring some strange battle cries to the Moat. One wily attacker rewrites the rulebook; Skabb splats himself in the Stockade and Jason and Matt go a little country.

item.title: Horrible Histories Live Action Series 3 Episode 6
item.description: Based on the best-selling books by Terry Deary, this series takes a comic look at some of the most fascinating events and characters from history in a funny, entertaining and ultimately memorable way.

item.title: Horrible Histories Live Action Series 3 Episode 5
item.description: Based on the best-selling books by Terry Deary, this series takes a comic look at some of the most fascinating events and characters from history in a funny, entertaining and ultimately memorable way.

item.title: The Killian Curse Episode 2
item.description: Killian Curse tells 21 stories, of 21 kids, from room 21, who must each face a demon sent from the demon world by the evil Charles Killian, who founded their school in 1906.

item.title: The Killian Curse Episode 1
item.description: Killian Curse tells 21 stories, of 21 kids, from room 21, who must each face a demon sent from the demon world by the evil Charles Killian, who founded their school in 1906.

item.title: Sparkle Friends Episode 8 Survival Of The Cutest
item.description: Camilla becomes jealous when Gun-gi gets all the attention of the Sparkle Friends.

item.title: Sparkle Friends Episode 7 Sparkletron
item.description: When Barry the bully picks on Charlie, there is only one name to call - Sparkletron.

item.title: Sparkle Friends Episode 6 High Score
item.description: When the Sparkle Friends get sucked into a video game, it's up to Richie to save them.

item.title: Sparkle Friends Episode 5 It's All Downhill
item.description: It's time for the Sparkle Friends trolley race, but the boys haven't put much effort into their trolleys.

item.title: Sparkle Friends Episode 4 Teething Trouble
item.description: Charlie is concerned when the rest of the Sparkle Friends don't brush their teeth before bed.

item.title: Figaro Pho Episode 8 Hypnophobia: The Fear Of Sleep
item.description: Figaro is sleeping peacefully when suddenly Boris the stinky man invades his dreams. We try to work out reality from fantasy as Boris keeps rearing his very ugly head.

item.title: Figaro Pho Episode 7 Gerontophobia: The Fear Of Old People
item.description: Figaro takes a trip down to the bus stop and discovers grandma Dorothy sitting on the bench. His horror of old people escalates as Dorothy offers Figaro a boiled mint from the bottom of her purse.

item.title: Figaro Pho Episode 7 Gerontophobia: The Fear Of Old People
item.description: Figaro takes a trip down to the bus stop and discovers grandma Dorothy sitting on the bench. His horror of old people escalates as Dorothy offers Figaro a boiled mint from the bottom of her purse.

item.title: Figaro Pho Episode 6 Felinophobia: The Fear Of Cats
item.description: Figaro's fear of cats comes to the fore when he hears the horrific sounds of a meowing cat at the front door. We see how the roles become reversed by the cunning wily ways of a very crafty kitty.

item.title: Figaro Pho Episode 5 Emetophobia: The Fear Of Vomiting
item.description: Figaro settles down to a nice meal of sausages, eggs and toast. When Figaro unwittingly consumes several mouthfuls of ancient curdled milk, his desire for morning breakfast comes to a grinding halt.

item.title: Figaro Pho Episode 4 Dermatosiophobia: The Fear Of Skin
item.description: Figaro goes about his usual morning ablutions only to realise that his skin is completely green when he switches on the bathroom light. Every time he switches the light off and on, his skin changes to a different skin pattern!

item.title: Casa De Evil Episode 7 Resort Facilities
item.description: The resort run by supervillains for supervillains.

item.title: Casa De Evil Episode 6 Spa
item.description: The resort run by supervillains for supervillains.

item.title: Casa De Evil Episode 5 Nightlife
item.description: The resort run by supervillains for supervillains.

item.title: Casa De Evil Episode 4 Gymnasium
item.description: The resort run by supervillains for supervillains.

item.title: Casa De Evil Episode 3 Skiing
item.description: The resort run by supervillains for supervillains.

item.title: Black Knight White Witch (ABC3 Interstitial) Episode 3 The Broom
item.description: Two characters straight out of a fractured fairytale who become neighbours.

item.title: Black Knight White Witch (ABC3 Interstitial) Episode 2 The Cook
item.description: Two characters straight out of a fractured fairytale who become neighbours.

item.title: Black Knight White Witch (ABC3 Interstitial) Episode 1 New Neighbour
item.description: Two characters straight out of a fractured fairytale who become neighbours.

item.title: Kid Vs Kat (Interstitials) Series 2 Episode 6 A Squirrel Wind Adventure
item.description: When Coop's spoiled little sister Millie brings home Kat, a stray kitty of mysterious origin, his idyllic life is turned upside-down. With felines like this, who needs enemies?

item.title: Kid Vs Kat (Interstitials) Series 2 Episode 5 Whiskering Heights
item.description: When Coop's spoiled little sister Millie brings home Kat, a stray kitty of mysterious origin, his idyllic life is turned upside-down. With felines like this, who needs enemies?

item.title: Kid Vs Kat (Interstitials) Series 2 Episode 4 Laser Guided Furball
item.description: When Coop's spoiled little sister Millie brings home Kat, a stray kitty of mysterious origin, his idyllic life is turned upside-down. With felines like this, who needs enemies?

item.title: Kid Vs Kat (Interstitials) Series 2 Episode 3 Geriatric Joust
item.description: When Coop's spoiled little sister Millie brings home Kat, a stray kitty of mysterious origin, his idyllic life is turned upside-down. With felines like this, who needs enemies?

item.title: Kid Vs Kat (Interstitials) Series 2 Episode 2 Itty Bitty Kitty Committee
item.description: When Coop's spoiled little sister Millie brings home Kat, a stray kitty of mysterious origin, his idyllic life is turned upside-down. With felines like this, who needs enemies?

item.title: Mega Bites (ABC Interstitial) Episode 5 Mega Bites (ABC3 Interstitial) : The Staffordshire Terrier
item.description: Presented by a budding biologist Georgie, with the reluctant assistance of her nervous cousin Ned, the bite power or various animals is examined.

item.title: Mega Bites (ABC Interstitial) Episode 4 Mega Bites (ABC3 Interstitial) : The Tiger Shark
item.description: Presented by a budding biologist Georgie, with the reluctant assistance of her nervous cousin Ned, the bite power or various animals is examined.

item.title: Mega Bites (ABC Interstitial) Episode 3 Mega Bites : The Tasmanian Devil
item.description: Presented by a budding biologist Georgie, with the reluctant assistance of her nervous cousin Ned, the bite power or various animals is examined.

item.title: Mega Bites (ABC Interstitial) Episode 2 Mega Bites : The Polar Bear
item.description: Presented by a budding biologist Georgie, with the reluctant assistance of her nervous cousin Ned, the bite power or various animals is examined.

item.title: Mega Bites (ABC Interstitial) Episode 1 Mega Bites
item.description: Presented by a budding biologist Georgie, with the reluctant assistance of her nervous cousin Ned, the bite power or various animals is examined.

item.title: Stay Tuned Episode 27 Part 3 : Internet
item.description: Joel and Nicole enlist the help of the Never Ever in their quest to find out how to get your band noticed online. Also featuring Good Charlotte and Tinie Tempah.

item.title: Stay Tuned Episode 27 Part 2 : Internet
item.description: Joel and Nicole enlist the help of the Never Ever in their quest to find out how to get your band noticed online. Also featuring Good Charlotte and Tinie Tempah.

item.title: Stay Tuned Episode 27 Part 1 : Internet
item.description: Joel and Nicole enlist the help of the Never Ever in their quest to find out how to get your band noticed online. Also featuring Good Charlotte and Tinie Tempah.

item.title: Stay Tuned Episode 26 Part 3 : Jobs In Music
item.description: Joel and Nicole find out how to get a job in music. They meet Good Charlotte and try various music industry careers. Also featuring Operator Please and Heroes For Hire.

item.title: Stay Tuned Episode 26 Part 1 : Jobs In Music
item.description: Joel and Nicole find out how to get a job in music. They meet Good Charlotte and try various music industry careers. Also featuring Operator Please and Heroes For Hire.

item.title: Stay Tuned Episode 25 Part 3 : Performance Training
item.description: Joel and Nicole meet an air guitar champion and go rock climbing with Jinja Safari as they try to find out what makes a good performance.

item.title: Stay Tuned Episode 25 Part 2 : Performance Training
item.description: Joel and Nicole meet an air guitar champion and go rock climbing with Jinja Safari as they try to find out what makes a good performance.

item.description: Joel and Nicole meet an air guitar champion and go rock climbing with Jinja Safari as they try to find out what makes a good performance.

item.title: Stay Tuned Episode 24 Part 3 : How To Get Your Band Signed
item.description: Access all areas of the music industry during the hottest new online and on-air interactive music show. Hosts Joel and Nicole do whatever it takes to find the answers to your questions while treating you to some new tunes.

item.title: Stay Tuned Episode 24 Part 2 : How To Get Your Band Signed
item.description: Access all areas of the music industry during the hottest new online and on-air interactive music show. Hosts Joel and Nicole do whatever it takes to find the answers to your questions while treating you to some new tunes.

item.title: Stay Tuned Episode 24 Part 1 : How To Get Your Band Signed
item.description: Hosts Joel and Nicole find out what it takes to get signed to a record label with the help of Peter Karpin and The Squared Division. This episode also features Billy from Good Charlotte and Brad from Heroes for Hire.

item.title: Stay Tuned Episode 23 Part 3 : Auditioning
item.description: Access all areas of the music industry during the hottest new online and on-air interactive music show. Hosts Joel and Nicole do whatever it takes to find the answers to your questions while treating you to some new tunes.

item.title: Stay Tuned Episode 23 Part 2 : Auditioning
item.description: Access all areas of the music industry during the hottest new online and on-air interactive music show. Hosts Joel and Nicole do whatever it takes to find the answers to your questions while treating you to some new tunes.

item.title: Stay Tuned Episode 23 Part 1 : Auditioning
item.description: Joel and Nicole find out what it takes to give a great audition with the help of the cast of hit musical, The Jersey Boys. Also featuring Heroes For Hire and Michael Franti.

item.title: Star Wars: The Clone Wars Series 2 Episode 18 The Zillo Beast
item.description: The Republic's new super-weapon awakens the fearsome Zillo Beast of Malastare. Now the Jedi must devise a way to contain the deadly creature.

item.title: Star Wars: The Clone Wars Series 2 Episode 17 Bounty Hunters
item.description: Anakin, Obi-Wan and Ahoska form an uneasy partnership with four deadly bounty hunters to help protect a local spice farmer from Hondo Onaka and his band of pirates.

item.title: Stoked Series 2 Episode 23
item.description: Six teenaged surfers come together one summer to work at the world renowned Surfer's Paradise Resort. The resort is located on the legendary Sunset Island, the home of the most epic surf break in the country!

item.title: Stoked Series 2 Episode 22 Surfers Got Talent
item.description: Bummer decides to up the entertainment value at the hotel by throwing a talent contest featuring the staff. The winner gets a four day weekend, but to get it, they'll have to put on an amazing original show of talent.

item.title: Stoked Series 2 Episode 20 Sweet, Sweet, Meat Cheat
item.description: Lo decides to go vegetarian, and threatens to dump Reef if he doesn't join her. Unfortunately, Reef is a major meat-atarian, and his brahs Johnny and Broseph are tempting him with delicious meat from a local hot dog festival.

item.title: Almost Naked Animals Episode 24 S.S. Banana Cabana
item.description: After an unexpected toilet mishap, the Banana Cabana winds up floating on the high seas - becoming a 'boatel'!

item.title: Almost Naked Animals Episode 23 Cool Paw Howie
item.description: Looking for a new challenge, Howie converts the hotel into a minimum security prison.

item.title: Almost Naked Animals Episode 22 Narwhal's Contest
item.description: Narwhal's biggest fan wins a 'spend a day with Narwhal' contest - but she ends up falling for Howie!

item.title: Almost Naked Animals Episode 21 Better Safe And Sorry
item.description: Octo the safety monitor tries to make the Banana Cabana too safe - with dangerous results!

item.title: Almost Naked Animals Episode 20 Fizz Fuzz Bang
item.description: Poodle attacks the Banana Cabana with Cap'N Fizzy's pirate ship - it's up to Howie to stop her.

item.title: The Tribe Series 4 Episode 18
item.description: Ebony pays Lex a visit in the middle of the night to administer the medication he needs. Meanwhile Pride is studying to keep one step ahead of the Technos, he is scheming a retaliation against their plans.

item.title: The Tribe Series 4 Episode 17
item.description: Salene and Pride debate the merits of the Techno's plan, could doomsday mark two be around the corner?

item.title: The Tribe Series 4 Episode 16
item.description: Jay and Ebony visit local farmers to encourage them to bring food in to the city. Meanwhile Pride returns to inform the Mall Rats about the Techno's power station plans.

item.title: The Tribe Series 4 Episode 15
item.description: Lex and Siva share another brief encounter in their secret love shack, while Java works out at the hotel and Pride and Salene flirt in the flora.

item.title: The Tribe Series 4 Episode 14
item.description: VED and his Techno programmers are busy working on RAM's software, Ved has out done himself. Has the passion between Pride and Salene disappeared?

item.title: The Tribe Series 4 Episode 13
item.description: Ved and the Technos raid the Mall for a computer. The intruder admits to planting the bomb in the hotel and Jay makes a deal so he can get more information about Ebony's potted past and her rise to power.

item.title: Eliot Kid Episode 14 The Broken Toy
item.description: Loretta very deviously offers Eliot a broken toy that she wants to get rid of.

item.title: Eliot Kid Episode 13 The Musketeer's Plot
item.description: Eliot, Mimi and Kaytoo swear that they will always be faithful to each other like the three musketeers.

item.title: Eliot Kid Episode 12 Eliot In Love
item.description: Eliot jumps with joy: he has to do an oral presentation in class on musicals with...Loretta, the love of his life.

item.title: Eliot Kid Episode 11 Kung Fu Kid
item.description: Bad news for Eliot. Max, his sworn enemy, challenges him to a martial arts duel. Luckily, Eliot is going to encounter a grand Shaolin master who possesses the secret to the famous..."Scream that stinks... "

item.title: Eliot Kid Episode 10 The Treasure Room
item.description: Suzie, who has had quite enough of her little brother, decides to move out of the room they share. But Eliot is soon convinced that his sister has discovered a fabulous treasure in her new bedroom.

item.title: Parallax Episode 19
item.description: Ben finds Otto in Techno World, but they are tracked by Spy Boy. Katherine speaks to Betti and tells Veronica, in code, that Ben is still alive. Otto tells Ben the purpose of the Reading Room.

item.title: Parallax Episode 18
item.description: Ben and Katherine find Otto, the lost Guardian of Forest World. Otto reveals that Veronica's pots are a map to the Reading Room of the Parallax. Katherine reveals her existence to Betti.

item.title: Parallax Episode 17
item.description: The kids fight the Krellicks and win the battle. But Betti wins the war when she and Spy Boy blandish the world. Katherine fools Betti into thinking that Ben has been eaten by the Mother of all Welkin.

item.title: Parallax Episode 16
item.description: Ben recruits Jeremy and Stefan to help fight Betti, but the two dads immediately lock horns the moment they meet each other. Ben discovers that the Staves can act as intercoms, and that Veronica is still alive.

item.title: Parallax Episode 15
item.description: Betti disguises herself as Veronica and goes to Ben's world, determined to find the mystery male Guardian. But Jeremy, the kids and Mrs Dawes fool her. Ben and Mundi find another Portal in Forest World, along with the Stave.

item.title: Animalia Episode 38 Paradise Found
item.description: With the Creeper gone and peace restored to Animalia, Alex and Zoe decide it's time to go home. Livingstone also decides to take a much needed break, but before he can go, he must choose a new leader.

item.title: Animalia Episode 37 Guardians Of The Core
item.description: Alex finds the Guardians of the Core Guidebook, which provides words and phrases that can help the Core. But when Alex isn't careful with the words he uses, the Core becomes a musical jukebox!

item.title: Animalia Episode 36 Tomorrow
item.description: Alex and Zoe join forces to write an original sci-fi story titled 'Tomorrow'. The story postures that if the world is going to end tomorrow, what would you do?

item.title: Animalia Episode 35 The Dragon And The Night
item.description: A corespore blasts off and flies to the land of Over and Beyond, where fictional characters live. With this Corespore missing, Animalians seem not to be able to agree about anything.

item.title: 6Teen Series 3 Episode 16 The One With The Cold Sore
item.description: An animated comedy set entirely in a gigantic shopping mall. Follows six 16-yr-old friends as they try to make it through their first part-time jobs and life as a teenager.

item.title: 6Teen Series 3 Episode 15 All Pets Are Off
item.description: An animated comedy set entirely in a gigantic shopping mall. Follows six 16-yr-old friends as they try to make it through their first part-time jobs and life as a teenager.

item.title: 6Teen Series 3 Episode 14 Another Day At The Office
item.description: An animated comedy set entirely in a gigantic shopping mall. Follows six 16-yr-old friends as they try to make it through their first part-time jobs and life as a teenager.

item.title: Good Game SP Series 2 Episode 39
item.description: Good Game SP is the show for younger gamers by gamers.

item.title: Good Game SP Series 2 Episode 38
item.description: Good Game SP is the show for younger gamers by gamers.

item.title: Deltora Quest Episode 28 The Great Gellick
item.description: Lief, Jasmine, and Barda must embark on a dangerous quest to recapture the seven lost gems of the magic Belt of Deltora. Only when the Belt is complete can the evil Shadow Lord be overthrown.

item.title: Deltora Quest Episode 27 Trapped Under Dread Mountain
item.description: Lief, Jasmine, and Barda must embark on a dangerous quest to recapture the seven lost gems of the magic Belt of Deltora. Only when the Belt is complete can the evil Shadow Lord be overthrown.

item.title: Deltora Quest Episode 26 Vraal Attack
item.description: Our heroes are faced with one intense battle after the other. First, it's nasty Gnomes; then it's the evil Grey Guards; and finally, a powerful monster named Vraal.

item.title: Deltora Quest Episode 25 Kin To The Air
item.description: Lief and the gang are on their way to Dread Mountain to find another stolen gem, when they stumble across the tombstone of someone they think they know...

item.title: Deltora Quest Episode 24 Meeting Prin
item.description: On the way to Dread Mountain, our heroes drink water from the magic Dreaming Spring. Are their nightmares about to turn into reality?

item.title: The Superhero Squad Show Series 2 Episode 14
item.description: There is a new villain in town - Thanos. Iron Man and his squad of the best heroes around battle it out with Thanos to try and stop him from unleashing his Infinity Gauntlet and wreaking havoc across the Universe!

item.title: The Superhero Squad Show Series 2 Episode 13
item.description: There is a new villain in town - Thanos. Iron Man and his squad of the best heroes around battle it out with Thanos to try and stop him from unleashing his Infinity Gauntlet and wreaking havoc across the Universe!

item.title: Karaoke High Episode 8
item.description: Set in New Zealand, follow a bunch of teens as they claw their way to the top of one of the country's most elite performing arts and academic schools. CAST: Miriama Smith, Phil Brown

item.description: Set in New Zealand, follow a bunch of teens as they claw their way to the top of one of the country's most elite performing arts and academic schools. CAST: Miriama Smith, Phil Brown

item.title: Monk Episode 33 Monk And The King Of The Kung Fu
item.description: Monk is a mischievous little dog! He gets over exited and has an unfortunate tendency to lose his cool when he gets upset. When things aren't working out for Monk, catastrophes follow. Monk gets annoyed by the tiniest things and when he blows his top, things can quickly get out of control.

item.description: Household objects rule the world in this kung-fu comedy caper, where an evil toilet chain of pure darkness and a heroic toilet brush battle for supremacy.

item.title: Naturally Sadie Series 3 Episode 8 The Graduate
item.description: 14-year-old Sadie Hawthorne is an aspiring naturalist who enjoys studying animal behaviour. She tries to apply the same knowledge towards the human race, - including her fellow students and her reluctant family.

item.title: Naturally Sadie Series 3 Episode 7 Hal's Kitchen
item.description: 14-year-old Sadie Hawthorne is an aspiring naturalist who enjoys studying animal behaviour. She tries to apply the same knowledge towards the human race, - including her fellow students and her reluctant family.

item.title: Naturally Sadie Series 3 Episode 6 Sadie's Millions
item.description: 14-year-old Sadie Hawthorne is an aspiring naturalist who enjoys studying animal behaviour. She tries to apply the same knowledge towards the human race, - including her fellow students and her reluctant family.

item.title: Naturally Sadie Series 3 Episode 5 Poetic Justice
item.description: Sadie encourages Ben to sign up for a poetry slam, but later regrets it when she hears what he's written; Hal gets Mall Cop fired.

item.title: Letterbox Episode 34
item.description: Hosted by actor and country music singer Adam James, Letterbox is a children's game show concentrating on grammar and spelling with special Indigenous language segments.

item.title: Letterbox Episode 33
item.description: Hosted by actor and country music singer Adam James, Letterbox is a children's game show concentrating on grammar and spelling with special Indigenous language segments.

item.title: Letterbox Episode 32
item.description: Hosted by actor and country music singer Adam James, Letterbox is a children's game show concentrating on grammar and spelling with special Indigenous language segments.

item.title: Letterbox Episode 31
item.description: Hosted by actor and country music singer Adam James, Letterbox is a children's game show concentrating on grammar and spelling with special Indigenous language segments.

item.title: Rush TV Episode 10
item.description: We hit up Fiji for our Surf Special. We board a 180-foot ship and join the likes of Mick Fanning, Andy Irons and Keala Kennelly for some great surf and all round good times.

item.title: Rush TV Episode 9
item.description: The team catch up with Byron Bay-born pro surf junior Garrett Parkes, and skateboarder Ant de Sylva who drops us some tips for fine tuning your 'manual rolls' in Watch A Pro.

item.title: Rush TV Episode 8
item.description: Layne Beachley gives some insight on how to stay focused as a junior, catch up with Jo Sheppard, another local 'killing' it on the FMX scene, and Darrel Stanton talks skating and making it as a pro.

item.title: Rush TV Episode 7
item.description: We hit Tasmania for a session at one of the best cold water waves on the planet, catch up with Jack Field who conquers any stationary object on his trials motor bike and head to Tokyo for the best in BMX Flat land.

item.title: Rush TV Episode 6
item.description: We take you on location to Robbie Maddison's annual FMX event in the outskirts of Sydney - Red Bull X-Ray and Jackson Shapiera gives us the low down on the insane sport of downhill skateboarding.

item.title: Rush TV Episode 5
item.description: We hit up Cairns - one of the strongest BMX scenes in Oz and catch up with local rider Nick Cooper, and Jye Kearney stops by for a chat between school and stamping his name on the Australian pro snowboarding scene.

item.title: Rush TV Episode 4
item.description: Hannah catches up with pro surfer Sally Fitzgibbons and gets the scoop on the nature of travelling and how her family have helped her surfing journey.

item.title: Rush TV Episode 3
item.description: We head to New Zealand for the Burton Open and check out all the action from the slope style contest and Mitch puts in a call to L.A and catches up with legendary skate photographer Mike O'Meally.

item.title: Bernard Episode 5 Security Guard
item.description: Bernard is very familiar with the museum he works in - with its old paintings, suits of armour and jewels. So why does that moving sculpture seem to be carrying a canvas in its hand?

item.title: Bernard Episode 4 The Swing
item.description: Bernard finds a beautiful tree with a beautiful swing. The only problem is that someone else got there first!

item.title: Bernard Episode 3 Ice Climbing
item.description: Bernard climbs the highest peak. But the closer he gets to the summit, the more frightened he becomes and the problems begin...

item.title: Bernard Episode 2 Golf
item.description: Bernard experiences the powerful attraction of the golf course... as well as the pull of gravity!

item.title: Richard Hammond's Blast Lab Episode 10
item.description: An entertaining and educational science game show jam-packed with the most spectacular stunts and awesome experiments on television. Two teams compete with each other to win prizes by battling it out over four rounds.

item.title: Richard Hammond's Blast Lab Episode 9
item.description: An entertaining and educational science game show jam-packed with the most spectacular stunts and awesome experiments on television. Two teams compete with each other to win prizes by battling it out over four rounds.

item.title: Richard Hammond's Blast Lab Episode 8
item.description: An entertaining and educational science game show jam-packed with the most spectacular stunts and awesome experiments on television. Two teams compete with each other to win prizes by battling it out over four rounds.

item.title: Richard Hammond's Blast Lab Episode 7 Musical Cushions
item.description: An entertaining and educational science game show jam-packed with the most spectacular stunts and awesome experiments on television. Two teams compete with each other to win prizes by battling it out over four rounds.

item.title: Total Drama World Tour Episode 26 (final) : Hawaiian Punch (Heather Wins)
item.description: An epic journey up the Big Island's active volcano determines a million dollar winner!

item.title: Total Drama World Tour Episode 25 Planes, Trains, Hot Air Mobiles
item.description: Without a plane, the contestants find themselves in a manic road-trip race - all the way to the shores of Hawaii...

item.title: Inside Life Episode 10 Madagascar Lemurs (Final)
item.description: On the island of Madagascar are a group of lemurs behaving badly. It's Billy Bridge's mission to discover just who and why.

item.title: Inside Life Episode 9 Bahamas Reef
item.description: James Murray's mission is to help sink a boat in the Bahamas for the Life team. But with the arrival of a hurricane James might run out of time... will he ever see the boat transformed into a colourful coral reef?

item.title: Inside Life Episode 8 Rock Climbing Fish
item.description: Expert climber Jacob Markham goes on an unusual mission to help the Life team film a Hawaiian waterfall where an extraordinary fish goes rock climbing!

item.title: Inside Life Episode 7 Tigers
item.description: Scarlett Flanagan gets all alarmed when she visits India to help film a tiger sequence for the Life team.

item.title: Inside Life Episode 6 Fish Frenzy
item.description: From spotting dolphins in Wales to spotting whales in Argentina, Sam Wigfield needs eagle eyes if he is to help the life team achieve their mission and film a bait ball out at sea.

item.title: Inside Life Episode 5 Frigate Birds
item.description: In the blue skies of the sun drenched Caribbean island of Tobago, Greg Thompson's mission is hotting up. He has to film frigate birds from a helicopter using Hollywood's latest aerial filming equipment.

item.title: Inside Life Episode 4 Garter Snakes
item.description: Every year thousands upon thousands of snakes come wriggling out from their dens deep in the heart of Canada. Matt Brough hitches a ride in a helicopter to help reveal some unusual behaviours of the cold blooded garter snake.

item.title: Inside Life Episode 3 Gibbons
item.description: Scaling the dizzy heights of a 30 metre tree in the Thailand rainforest, Bryony Maxwell helps set up a filming platform high above the ground for the Life Team.

item.title: Inside Life Episode 2 Komodo Dragons
item.description: On a remote Indonesian island and surrounded by three giant komodo dragons Isobel Rose must remember all she learnt about these potential killers back at the London Zoo's reptile House.

item.title: Inside Life Episode 1 Polar Bears
item.description: Seen through the eyes of ten children, take a look at the making of BBC's popular natural history series called Life, hosted by David Attenborough. The lucky kids get to go on location and actually get hands on experience.

item.title: Mona The Vampire Series 4 Episode 13 Medusa's Revenge/ The Fearsome Forecasts (Final)
item.description: Mona Parker is an average girl, though in her own imagination she can be anything that she wishes. Each day Mona meets up with her friends to save the world!

item.title: Mona The Vampire Series 4 Episode 12 Rockin' Reptile Roundup/ The Suck-O-5000
item.description: Mona Parker is an average girl, though in her own imagination she can be anything that she wishes. Each day Mona meets up with her friends to save the world!

item.title: Mona The Vampire Series 4 Episode 11 The Sandman/ Von Kreepsula's Day Off
item.description: Mona Parker is an average girl, though in her own imagination she can be anything that she wishes. Each day Mona meets up with her friends to save the world!

item.title: Mona The Vampire Series 4 Episode 10 Nickelodeon Nightmare/ Ready Steady Yeti
item.description: Mona Parker is an average girl, though in her own imagination she can be anything that she wishes. Each day Mona meets up with her friends to save the world!

item.title: Mona The Vampire Series 4 Episode 9 Would You Like Fries With That?/ The Haunted School Bus
item.description: Mona Parker is an average girl, though in her own imagination she can be anything that she wishes. Each day Mona meets up with her friends to save the world!

item.title: Mona The Vampire Series 4 Episode 8 Aliens 1-2-3/ Zapman, Myself And I
item.description: Mona Parker is an average girl, though in her own imagination she can be anything that she wishes. Each day Mona meets up with her friends to save the world!

item.description: Mona Parker is an average girl, though in her own imagination she can be anything that she wishes. Each day Mona meets up with her friends to save the world!

item.title: Mona The Vampire Series 4 Episode 6 Gotto Robotto/ The Laser Wizard
item.description: Mona Parker is an average girl, though in her own imagination she can be anything that she wishes. Each day Mona meets up with her friends to save the world!

item.title: The Legend of Dick and Dom Series 2 Episode 18
item.description: The inhabitants of Fyredor have been struck down by a terribly irritating, yet non-fatal plague. Their only hope for a cure rests with a young wizard who has scoured the earth for an antidote.

item.title: The Legend of Dick and Dom Series 2 Episode 17 Sirens
item.description: The inhabitants of Fyredor have been struck down by a terribly irritating, yet non-fatal plague. Their only hope for a cure rests with a young wizard who has scoured the earth for an antidote.

item.title: The Legend of Dick and Dom Series 2 Episode 16 Hag Puss
item.description: The inhabitants of Fyredor have been struck down by a terribly irritating, yet non-fatal plague. Their only hope for a cure rests with a young wizard who has scoured the earth for an antidote.

item.title: The Legend of Dick and Dom Series 2 Episode 15
item.description: The inhabitants of Fyredor have been struck down by a terribly irritating, yet non-fatal plague. Their only hope for a cure rests with a young wizard who has scoured the earth for an antidote.

item.title: Edgar And Ellen (Shorts) Episode 6 Grime Doesn't Pay
item.description: Wesley Puddlesby, cleaning aficionado, comes to tidy the twins' filthy house. Edgar and Ellen try to ruin the cleaning escapade with pranks ranging from egg-shooting candles to trained bugs but are foiled at every turn.

item.title: Edgar And Ellen (Shorts) Episode 5 Lessie's More
item.description: Mayor Knightleigh is planning Knightleigh's first 'Get Sand in Your Pants Day'. Edgar and Ellen menace the mayor with their homemade monster, Lessie, but the plan backfires, inspiring an even greater event!

item.title: Edgar And Ellen (Shorts) Episode 4 Let Them Wear Cake
item.description: It's Stephanie Knightleigh's birthday so Edgar and Ellen sneak exploding candles onto her cake. The twins sneak back to find the rest of their exploding candle stash has been ignited.

item.title: Edgar And Ellen (Shorts) Episode 3 Operation Blabberfish
item.description: The twins build a talking fish to scare nave townspeople into giving money. When a hungry cat eats their fish and two kids return the money, Edgar and Ellen end up with nothing but some linty candy and a sewer full of sludge.

item.title: What's Up Warthogs! Episode 20 Election (Final)
item.description: It's Election Day at West Hill High and Victoria's campaign kicks into high gear until the gang notices her name isn't on the ballot!

item.title: What's Up Warthogs! Episode 19 I'm A Runnin
item.description: Much to Victoria's chagrin, a new candidate, Money Melvin, enters the race for student body president and jumps ahead in the polls with his unusual campaign.

item.title: What's Up Warthogs! Episode 18 Drama At West Hills
item.description: The drama teacher at West Hill High is brought in to add some 'panache' to 'What's up, Warthogs!' Drama ensues when he reveals his plans to recast the entire show.

item.title: What's Up Warthogs! Episode 17 Tale Of Two Love Birds
item.description: Eric tries to impress a girl and becomes jealous when the gang seems to like her more than him.

item.title: What's Up Warthogs! Episode 16 Kitchen Confidential
item.description: When Lunch Lady Marge quits, the gang is forced to step in and help Mr. Devoni prepare Principal Coronal Masters' favourite meal for the annual A/V club budget meeting.

item.title: What's Up Warthogs! Episode 15 Digital Detox
item.description: Victoria convinces Principal Coronel Masters to institute a West Hill Digital Detox week. All forms of technology are banned leaving Charlie without his camera, Laney without her calculator and Eric without the show!

item.title: What's Up Warthogs! Episode 14
item.description: Eric is sent home sick and Victoria must choose between nursing her rival back to health and accepting an even less desirable replacement co-host.

item.title: What's Up Warthogs! Episode 13 What's Up Warthogs : Rumble In The Lab
item.description: Eric goes to great lengths to pull a prank on an unsuspecting Victoria while Laney makes friends with an older version of herself.

item.title: What's Up Warthogs! Episode 12 What's Up Warthogs : Not On My....But
item.description: Eric and Mr. Denovi bond over girl troubles and Victoria finds her funny bone.

item.title: What's Up Warthogs! Episode 11 What's Up Warthogs : Who Wants To Take A Midterm?
item.description: Eric learns he's on academic probation and will have to quit his beloved show 'What's Up, Warthogs!' if he doesn't ace his upcoming Social Studies midterm.

item.title: What's Up Warthogs! Episode 10 What's Up Warthogs : Video Killed The Television Star
item.description: Charlie becomes an overnight celebrity with the success of his latest viral video. Will the fame go to his head when fans demand another video?

item.title: What's Up Warthogs! Episode 9 What's Up Warthogs : Trashbusters
item.description: Victoria starts a recycling program at West Hill. When empty bottles go missing, Charlie becomes convinced a ghost is haunting the A/V studio.

item.title: The Dukes Of Broxstonia Series 2 Episode 10 On TV (Final)
item.description: An animated series following Brxstnia's hottest band, The Dukes - singer Arj, drummer Barj and guitarist Larj, as they go on tour, spreading their uniquely punk trash sounds to an unsuspecting world.

item.title: The Dukes Of Broxstonia Series 2 Episode 9 Trophy
item.description: The Dukes win Best Band Hair Award only to have their trophy stolen by the Lukes.

item.title: The Dukes Of Broxstonia Series 2 Episode 8 The Dukes Of Broxtonia : Strong Arj
item.description: Arj quits the band to front his own strong man show at a music festival.

item.title: How To Be Indie Series 2 Episode 26 How To Get Smooched (Final)
item.description: Indie wants to smooch Aiden, but at what cost?

item.title: How To Be Indie Series 2 Episode 25 How To Have A Movie Magic Vacation
item.description: When Indie puts the family vacation in jeopardy, she needs all the magic of a Bollywood musical to get things back on track.

item.title: How To Be Indie Series 2 Episode 24 How To Clean Up At Stand Up
item.description: Indie takes on Carlos Martinelli and his cruel jokes.

item.title: How To Be Indie Series 2 Episode 23 How To Fake Your Way Through A Freaky Formal
item.description: Indie gets to go to Chandra's formal, but there's a catch: she has to go disguised as Chandra!

item.title: How To Be Indie Series 2 Episode 22 How To Bend The Rules
item.description: Indie does whatever it takes to go with Aiden on a trip to an amusement park.

item.title: How To Be Indie Series 2 Episode 21 How To Update Your Status
item.description: Indie's efforts to pin down her and Aiden's status have him running for the hills.

item.title: How To Be Indie Series 2 Episode 20 How To Be A Leader
item.description: Indie and Evil Cousin Ruby face off at volleyball.

item.title: How To Be Indie Series 2 Episode 19 How To Get Out Of Big, Big Trouble
item.description: Indie's been grounded, but she doesn't know why!

item.title: How To Be Indie Series 2 Episode 18 How To Beat Chandra
item.description: Indie vows to be better than her sister at something!

item.title: How To Be Indie Series 2 Episode 17 How To Get Plugged In
item.description: Indie wants to get cable TV, but does a slip of the tongue mean that dream is out of the picture?

item.title: How To Be Indie Series 2 Episode 16 How To Make A Christmas Miracle
item.description: Indie loves Christmas so much she vows to keep her spirit alive all year. But it isn't easy when everything and everyone seems out to squash her fa-la-la.

item.title: M.I. High Series 5 Episode 13 M.I High : The Lost Hero
item.description: Oscar behaves recklessly and the Head of MI9 tells him to stay off duty until he's calmed down. Angry and frustrated, Oscar decides to infiltrate SKUL and bring them down from the inside.

item.title: M.I. High Series 5 Episode 12 Day Of The Jacket
item.description: Eccentric inventor Dr Carla Baxter is kidnapped from outside the scientific facility where she works, along with her latest invention - a jacket that allows the wearer to look and sound like someone else.

item.title: M.I. High Series 5 Episode 11 The First To Crack
item.description: As the team track down a SKUL agent called Suki, Oscar refuses to stick to the agreed plan and jeopardises the operation.

item.title: M.I. High Series 5 Episode 10 Tim Brown's Skul Days
item.description: As the team track down a SKUL agent called Suki. When captured, Suki refuses to tell them anything, but a data card she is carrying reveals the existence of a training school for young SKUL agents known as the 'SKUL Academy'.

item.title: M.I. High Series 5 Episode 9 Bully Elliot
item.description: The team prevent the destruction of a warehouse containing the new invention of billionaire Steve Cobbs - a 'Pearental Guidance' kit that allows parents to force their lazy children to exercise.

item.title: HotSpell Episode 8
item.description: 20 contestants battle it out in a game all about spelling! It has all the drama, tension and triumph of a great sporting event, so stay tuned to find out who the ultimate winner will be.

item.title: HotSpell Episode 7
item.description: 20 contestants battle it out in a game all about spelling! It has all the drama, tension and triumph of a great sporting event, so stay tuned to find out who the ultimate winner will be.

item.description: 20 contestants battle it out in a game all about spelling! It has all the drama, tension and triumph of a great sporting event, so stay tuned to find out who the ultimate winner will be.

item.title: HotSpell Episode 5
item.description: 20 contestants battle it out in a game all about spelling! It has all the drama, tension and triumph of a great sporting event, so stay tuned to find out who the ultimate winner will be.

item.title: HotSpell Episode 4
item.description: 20 contestants battle it out in a game all about spelling! It has all the drama, tension and triumph of a great sporting event, so stay tuned to find out who the ultimate winner will be.

item.title: Black Hole High Series 4 Episode 3 Conclusions: Part Three
item.description: Josie returns to stop Avenir from his ultimate victory but makes a shocking discovery about the identity of her father.

item.title: Black Hole High Series 4 Episode 2 Conclusions: Part Two
item.description: Josie 2 rescues Josie from the alternate dimension while Avenir plots to steal control of Victor's time jumping technology.

item.title: Black Hole High Series 4 Episode 1 Conclusions: Part One
item.description: Josie is stranded in an alternate dimension that she somehow created when she stole Victor's power source.
